segments.text: Yes , we shall . What size do you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which do you prefer , color or black and white ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The last one is black and white , all the rest should need color .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope they will come out well . When should I pick them up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They will be ready at noon tomorrow . Each negative develops one print , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . And develop them as glossy as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Do you need another film ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a roll of Kodak film please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is totally $ 20 including the deposit for films .
segments.speaker: S2
